field.title: Include Styles
field.description: Include/exclude styles bundled with the plugin.

field.title: Mode
field.description: Controls animation behaviour.
field.help: With carousel everything slides to the side, while gallery uses fade animations and changes all slides at once.

field.title: Axis
field.description: The axis of the slider.

field.title: Items
field.description: Number of slides being displayed in the viewport. If slides less or equal than items, the slider won't be initialized.

field.title: Gutter
field.description: Space between slides (in "px").

field.title: Edge Padding
field.description: Space on the outside (in "px").

field.title: Fixed Width
field.description: Controls width attribute of the slides. If empty, no value will be set for the property.

field.title: Fixed Height
field.description: Controls height attribute of the slides. If empty, no value will be set for the property.

field.title: Auto Width
field.description: If true, the width of each slide will be its natural width as a inline-block box.

field.title: Viewport Max
field.description: Maximum viewport width for fixedWidth/autoWidth. If empty, no value will be set for the property.

field.title: Slide By
field.description: Number of slides going on one "click".

field.title: Slide by Page
field.description: Slide one page on one 'click'. If set to true, 'Slide By' value will be ignored.

field.title: Center
field.description: Center the active slide in the viewport.

field.title: Controls
field.description: Controls the display and functionalities of controls components (prev/next buttons).
field.help:
If true, display the controls and add all functionalities.
For better accessibility, when a prev/next button is focused, user will be able to control the slider using left/right arrow keys.

field.title: Controls Position
field.description: Controls 'controls' position.

field.title: Previous Control Text
field.description: Text in the previous button.

field.title: Next Control Text
field.description: Text in the previous button.

field.title: Controls Container
field.description: The container selector around the prev/next buttons. If empty, no value will be set for the property.
field.help: Controls Container must have at least 2 child elements.

field.title: Previous Button
field.description: Customized previous button. This option will be ignored if Controls Container is a CSS selector. If left empty, value will be set to false.

field.title: Next Button
field.description: Customized next button. This option will be ignored if Controls Container is a CSS selector. If empty, no value will be set for the property.

field.title: Nav Components
field.description: Controls the display and funcionalities of nav components (dots).
field.help: If true, display the nav and add all functionalities.

field.title: Nav Position
field.description: Controls nav position.

field.title: Nav Container
field.description: The container element/selector around the dots. If empty, no value will be set for the property.
field.help: Nav Container must have at least same number of children as the slides.

field.title: Nav as Thumbnails
field.description: Indicate if the dots are thumbnails. If true, they will always be visible even when more than 1 slides displayed in the viewport.

field.title: Arrow Keys
field.description: Allows using arrow keys to switch slides.

field.title: Speed
field.description: Speed of the slide animation (in "ms").

field.title: Autoplay
field.description: Toggles the automatic change of slides.

field.title: Autoplay Position
field.description: Controls autoplay position.

field.title: Autoplay Timeout
field.description: Time between 2 autoplay slides change (in "ms").

field.title: Autoplay Direction
field.description: Direction of slide movement (ascending/descending the slide index).

field.title: Autoplay 'Start' Text
field.description: Text or markup in the autoplay start button.

field.title: Autoplay 'Stop' Text
field.description: Text or markup in the autoplay stop button.

field.title: Autoplay Hover Pause
field.description: Stops sliding on mouseover.

field.title: Autoplay Button
field.description: The customized autoplay start/stop selector. If empty, no value will be set for the property.

field.title: Autoplay Button Output
field.description: Output autoplayButton markup when autoplay is true but a customized autoplayButton is not provided.

field.title: Autoplay Reset on Visibility
field.description: Pauses the sliding when the page is invisible and resumes it when the page become visible again.

field.title: Animate In
field.description: Name of intro animation class.

field.title: Animate Out
field.description: Name of outro animation class.

field.title: Animate Normal
field.description: Name of default animation class.

field.title: Animate Delay
field.description: Time between each gallery animation (in "ms"). If empty, no value will be set for the property.

field.title: Loop
field.description: Moves throughout all the slides seamlessly.

field.title: Rewind
field.description: Moves to the opposite edge when reaching the first or last slide.

field.title: Auto Height
field.description: Height of slider container changes according to each slide's height.

field.title: Touch
field.description: Activates input detection for touch devices.

field.title: Mouse Drag
field.description: Changing slides by dragging them.

field.title: Swipe Angle
field.description: Swipe or drag will not be triggered if the angle is not inside the range when set.

field.title: Prevent Action When Running
field.description: Prevent next transition while slider is transforming.

field.title: Prevent Scroll on Touch
field.description: Prevent page from scrolling on touchmove.
field.help: If set to "auto", the slider will first check if the touch direction matches the slider axis, then decide whether prevent the page scrolling or not. If set to "force", the slider will always prevent the page scrolling.

field.title: Freezable
field.description: Indicate whether the slider will be frozen (controls, nav, autoplay and other functions will stop work) when all slides can be displayed in one page.

field.title: Start Index
field.description: The initial index of the slider.

field.title: Use Local Storage
field.description: Save browser capability variables to localStorage and without detecting them everytime the slider runs if set to true.

field.title: Nonce
field.description: Optional Nonce attribute for inline style tag to allow slider usage without `unsafe-inline Content Security Policy source. If empty, no value will be set for the property.

property.name: text
property.value: For more information about the carousel options visit  here.

field.title: Namespace
field.description: Namespace to be used to store the slider object once it's initialized. Default to 'window'.

field.title: Element Id
field.description: Id to be used as the slider object name. If empty, the objectId will be set a the value.

field.title: Responsive
field.description: Defines options for different viewport widths.

property.name: text
property.value: For more information about responsive options and methods visit here.
